content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -122.0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (-59.5, -111.5)
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -122.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-68.5, -95.5)
- Connected pipes from the offshore pump to the boiler

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) and an Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0)

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0)
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) connected to the furnace at position (6.0, -62.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, -61.5) and another at (6.5, -59.5)

### Pipe Network
- Multiple Pipe Groups connecting various fluid systems, including a working water supply system at position (-42.5, -125.5) and several empty systems.

### Electricity Network
- Small Electric Poles distributed across positions, including connections at (-61.5, -111.5), (-57.5, -109.5), and other positions.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Placing Entities Too Far
- Ensure you are within the maximum placement distance of 10 units from the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors When Placing Entities on Occupied Tiles
- Verify that the target tile is clear of other entities before placing a new entity to avoid placement failures.
